column4: anyone know how to keep my speaker volume from resetting to 0 on restart?
as my machine has problems with pulseaudio
also whats the output of "which alsactl"?
can you pastebin the contents of your /var/lib/alsa/asound.state for me?
brb, moving to another physical room
after you do "sudo alsactl store" can you do "echo $?"
if it gives a 0, that means "it claims to have worked"
ok so its saying it can write to the asound.state just fine... can you do "sudo alsa force-reload" and then pastebin the asound.state again?
your asound.state looks like it didnt revert to a bunch of 0s...
can't decide if that is good or bad
If it did I would at least have an idea of what is causing this
